trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 15th 1981
divs: Sighting DetailsMy children and I were sitting outside of our Motorhome, parked in a Parking Lot where my husband worked at the time. He was inside. The kids were playing and all of a sudden the large circlular sphere flew above us and off into the no where. It was not far above us and definetly not a plane, it was too low to the ground. The object flew right above our heads andthen it just disappeared as fast into nowhere. I will never forget this day because it was a quite Sunday afternoon and no people were around but us it was a warm day and we were outside.This was on a weekend and no one else was around. I will always remember this object because there were no reports of any rockets being shot off at Vanderburg AFB. I fully believe we saw a UFO that day. I am not exact on dates and time but it did happen.
Summary: Large Round Disc shaped object came across sky at a fast speed and low altitude
